General.Name: Hwa Tai Industries Bhd
General.Description: Hwa Tai Industries Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in biscuits and other confectionery products in Malaysia and internationally. It operates through two segments, Manufacturing and Trading. The company offers crackers, cookies, cakes, cream sandwiches, and assorted biscuits under the HWA TAI, LUXURY, and PESTA brand names. It is also involved in property holding business; and trading and distribution of its products to various chain of outlets, as well as an original equipment manufacturer (OEM) for third party's brand of biscuits. Hwa Tai Industries Berhad was founded in 1962 and is based in Seri Kembangan, Malaysia.
